data.name: Wai Meli
data.description: Wai Meli is a harmonic symphony of flavor, with notes of honey and a bubbly feel. We make it from the finest honey that bees have to offer; Macademia nut honey is found nowhere else but Hawai'i.
data.foodPairings: This is a medium-sweet spiced mead that goes well with a nice meal and excellent company.

available.name: Year Round
available.description: Available year round as a staple beer.

style.name: Metheglin
style.description: In well-made examples of the style, the herbs/spices are both distinctive and well-incorporated into the honey-sweet-acid-tannin-alcohol balance of the mead. Different types of herbs/spices can result in widely different characteristics; allow for a variation in the final product.

breweries.name: Pacific Breach
breweries.description: We are a Hawaiian craft brewery with a solid lineup that covers a wide range of styles. Some examples are: Hawaiian Pale Ale (finishes with hints of Hawaiian orange peel), Wai Meli (Spiced mead made from macadamia nut honey, which is produced *only* in Hawaii), and Green Tea Ginger, a light beer that starts with the smoothness of four kinds of green tea and finishes with a hint of ginger spice.
